header.greeting: It's nice to meet you, I'm
header.name: HUYNH HUU PHUOC
header.intro:
I'm a Flutter developer who loves how technology can turn small ideas into real products that people actually use.
Over the past 2 years, I've built multiple mobile applications with smooth performance, clean UI, and a user experience that makes people want to keep using the app.
I'm always eager to learn new things, refine every line of code, and ready to take on exciting challenges ahead.
header.location: Go Vap, Ho Chi Minh City
header.short_term: I focus on enhancing my expertise in Flutter and Dart through real-world mobile projects. My short-term goal is to strengthen skills in state management, API integration, and app performance optimization. I also aim to learn from experienced engineers and contribute effectively to the success of the team.
header.long_term: I aspire to develop my career into a Project Manager in mobile application development. I aim not only to excel technically but also to master project management processes, team collaboration, and strategic decision-making. My goal is to lead impactful tech projects that deliver real value to users and contribute to business growth.

items.title: ITBee Solutions (Mobile Developer)
items.desc: Build and develop cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter, publishing apps on Google Play Store and App Store. Ensure product stability, performance optimization, and full compliance with business technical requirements.
items.tech: Flutter, GetX, Sqflite, Google API, Firebase, SQL Server

items.title: DMSpro (Flutter Developer - Offshore/Onsite)
items.desc: Contributed to the development of Flutter mobile applications at DMSpro. Worked directly with clients in an onsite/offshore model to analyze requirements, enhance user experience, and ensure project progress. Responsible for implementing business logic, integrating RESTful APIs, optimizing performance, and supporting bug fixing during UAT and production phases.
items.tech: Flutter, GetX, Sqflite, RESTful API, Firebase, etc.

items.title: Freelance
items.desc: During my time as a university student, I took on several small freelance projects to gain hands-on experience and improve my skills. I developed web interfaces using ReactJS, built simple React Native apps, integrated APIs, and created basic backends with NodeJS. These projects helped me understand how to work with clients, plan features, and deliver complete products.
items.tech: ReactJS, React Native, NodeJS, Firebase, MySQL, MongoDB

items.title: Private Tutor – Programming & Probability Statistics
items.desc: Tutored university students in Basic Programming (C/Java) and Probability & Statistics. Helped learners strengthen foundational knowledge, guided them through assignments and mini-projects, and enhanced their problem-solving and logical thinking skills.

details.frameworks: Flutter, React Native, ReactJs, NodeJs, Spring Boot
details.tools: VS Code, Android Studio, Xcode, Git, Postman, Jira, Figma

items.name: Drink Ordering App
items.desc: A mobile application that allows users to order drinks online in two forms: individual orders and group orders.
detail: Designed UI/UX and fully developed the app using Flutter.
Integrated payments, voucher application, and push notifications using Firebase Cloud Messaging.
Supported Group Order: create groups and share codes (deeplink) for multiple users to join and order together.
Handled individual and group shopping carts.
Processed image uploads to AWS S3 using Presigned URLs.
Deployed the app to production (including building and store release) and optimized performance.

items.name: Sales Force Automation
items.desc: An application that helps sales teams manage orders, customers, inventory, and daily routes.
detail: Developed features such as order creation, attendance tracking, customer check-in, and inventory management.
Integrated Google Maps for location tracking, navigation, and route history.
Implemented offline storage using SQLite and data synchronization with backend when online.
Optimized performance and wrote Unit Tests for critical logic.
items.tech: Flutter, Dart, GetX, Dio, SQLite, Google Maps Flutter, Unit Testing

items.name: Affiliate E-Commerce App
items.desc: An e-commerce application that allows users to purchase dairy products through affiliate marketing links.
detail: Developed features such as product categories, shopping cart, vouchers, order placement, logistics integration, and payment.
Integrated VNPay for secure online payments.
Used Firebase Cloud Messaging for order and promotion notifications.
Managed user sessions using Secure Storage and Shared Preferences.
Deployed the app to production (including building and store release) and optimized performance.
items.tech: Flutter, Dart, BLoC, Dio, Shared Preferences, Secure Storage, VNPay, Firebase Cloud Messaging

items.name: Loan Profile Management App
items.desc: An app for managing loan profiles for customers and bank staff in real time.
detail: Customers can view loan details and repayment schedules.
Staff can update application status and track processing progress.
Stored data offline using Hive + SQLite and synchronized via WebSocket.
Ensured user data security and access control.
items.tech: Flutter, Dart, Provider, Dio, Hive, SQLite, WebSocket

items.name: Apartment Management System
items.desc: (Graduation Project)A comprehensive apartment management application for residents and building administrators, supporting both web and mobile platforms.
detail: Developed web management interface using ReactJS and backend with Node.js and MongoDB.
Built Flutter mobile app with Provider, synchronized with backend, and supported push notifications via Firebase.
Integrated VNPay for secure payment of electricity, water, and service bills.
Implemented AI chatbot to assist residents with inquiries and guidance, powered by ChatGPT API.
Managed residents, apartments, services, bills, and notifications in real time.
Ensured data security, user role-based access control (resident – administrator), and optimized app performance.
items.tech: Flutter, Provider, Firebase, VNPay, ReactJS, Node.js, MongoDB, ChatGPT API

university.name: Ho Chi Minh City University of Industry (IUH)

clients.title: CLIENTS
clients.description: Some of the leading brands I have worked with on projects or provided technical support
